text: The men's K-1 1000 metres competition of the canoeing event at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games was held on 6 June 2015 at the Marina Channel in Singapore. ==Schedule== All times are Singapore Standard Time (UTC+08:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !|Date !!Time !!Event |-style="background-color:lemonchiffon;" |Saturday, 6 June 2015 ||09:30 ||Final |} == Results == === Final === : {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Athletes !width=80|Time |- | ||align=left| ||3:43.036 |- | ||align=left| ||3:45.126 |- | ||align=left| ||3:48.220 |- | 4 ||align=left| ||3:54.801 |- | 5 ||align=left| ||4:06.197 |- | 6 ||align=left| ||4:11.692 |- | 7 ||align=left| ||4:34.988 |} ==References== ==External links== * Men's K-1 1000 metres
title: Canoeing at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games – Men's K-1 1000 metres
